website_summaries.verdict: Surface contains dimples to ensure a sturdy grip and durable feel.
pros: Available in three different color options and in three different size options of 3, 4, or 5
Perfect for helping novices learn to control the ball during practice sessions
Tacky outer surface yields a good grip in all weather
cons: Ball may struggle to hold air over multiple practice sessions

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure it's new
customer_reviews.text: Decent rugby ball for the price, HOWEVER, mine had obvious use before. There were some scuff marks showing that someone has played with it and not "fresh" from the factory. I let it slide and did not complain. Ball when inflated shows some weak spots in the stitching were I am afraid it might burst later in the future. However, I just have it for casual play and do not expect it to be failing me anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Olga  S Kormuskina

customer_reviews.title: Decent ball for the price. Has a very rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent ball for the price. Has a very rubber grip/texture. Not sure how it would hold up to regular use, we just use it to toss around.
customer_reviews.author: jay c

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 balls for practice use with a team I coach. I inflated them and found their grip (or lack thereof) very disappointing. Then I heard that inevitable "hssssss" of air leaking out the seams. Never used them; returning them and spending a little more money for something with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable ball for any use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball strictly for the visibility when taking a ball out on the boat. Typically I use match balls even for practice but this ball is great, it has great grip, right size, weight, etc. Good ball for practice or pick up games.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieKiller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball. Not as giant as an official size and hasn't lost any air like some of the reviews said.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great ball. Hold the air perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Hold the air perfectly. Grip lasts a long time and won't run out until after the ball is not usefull
customer_reviews.author: Mrbfirst

customer_reviews.title: Lousy materials
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this ball twice now. First one lasted a few weeks before it started leaking air. This second one didn’t hold air at all and was returned immediately. Come on, guys! I’m trying to spread Rugby here in the states. Can’t do that without a ball
customer_reviews.author: Jess and Evan Garriga

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was good... until it wasnt.
customer_reviews.text: The stitching was off, but I thought I could deal with that. After inflating the ball and leaving it to sit for a week or 2, it was almost completely deflated. Its ok if you don't like good quality merchandise. Spend $10 more and get a real ball (Gilbert) from WRS
customer_reviews.author: C. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This ball has a great touch, nice feel and handled to it Will buy more in the future for my group kicking sessions
customer_reviews.author: Johnson101

customer_reviews.title: Decent practice ball
customer_reviews.text: For the price the ball is good but the seams don't line up very well and it deformed slightly. I got it just to practice ball handling and it serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it so far. They're not actually big enough for this to be the appropriate size, but they'll grow into it. Seems roughly the same quality as any standard practice ball and looks like it'll hold up to actual use when we get there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright color and good grip!
customer_reviews.text: Really good grip and aesthetic design. The Omega balls seem to be longer and more pointed than the Rhino or Gilbert balls. All around good ball and my girls love it.
customer_reviews.author: beau reimink

customer_reviews.title: Quality is 2nd to none.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality ball and is holding up really well. The price on Amazon is great and the quality is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Why pay more

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for backyard fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ball for backyard play. Needed a ball to practice general handling skills with and this ball has been great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the rugby ball and it came with a hole in it. The return part was fine but when we received the replacement ball that also has a hole in it. Such a bummer. We orders 3 in total and they all came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: brian m hurst

customer_reviews.title: Since first day ball looses air
customer_reviews.text: Son likes the grip bit returing because he needs a reliable ball for school. He is done pumping the ball up every day. Returning & ordering another, hoping this is just bad luck.
customer_reviews.author: Say Whaaaaa???

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this ball for fitness drills and training and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see and catch
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids and easy to catch and see for late days
customer_reviews.author: Amy and Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Xmas gift for niece ! Big hole in the end of the ball ! Very poor !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid ball for practice or a game.
customer_reviews.text: Great rugby ball. Good grip, good weight and not deformed at all. Brought it to practice and the team like it better than Gilbert ones.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Best Balls EVER
customer_reviews.text: These rugby balls are great quality, our go to gift for beginner ruggers - love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Just Ask Kaaren

customer_reviews.title: Leaking air
customer_reviews.text: Leaks air from end seam. I didn’t notice soon enough to return it
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Dengler

customer_reviews.title: Sprang a Leak
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long and it already started leaking out of the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Mason McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: It comes deflated so make sure you have an air pump at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Decent ball
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent rugby ball. It has good grip, but loses air quickly and is a little irregular.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome, even after a few weeks of not play, it didn't leak much!
customer_reviews.author: Hui, Siu Wo

customer_reviews.title: Not good business.
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Kenya to my orphanage & both of them had holes in them. Not good business.
customer_reviews.author: Big Poppa

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st ball for youngsters
customer_reviews.text: Great training ball. Perfect for youngsters learning to handle the ball. Durable and top quality construction. Ordered size 3 for 2 yr old toddler and he loves it. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Honey from Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for great game
customer_reviews.text: I just started playing rugby a three month ago and love the game , this ball is great quality that even my teammates are using too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think im gonna stick with Gilbert from now on.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my size 5 rugby ball today. I was extremely excited because my team was going to play a pickup and i order this ball specifically because we disnt habe a useable ball. Sadly this ball doesnt hold any air. It leaks all along the seams and at both ends.
customer_reviews.author: love app

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Came deflated. Have no way to inflate. Needs special needle. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MollyCMo

customer_reviews.title: Well made Rugby Ball
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected ! A well made Rugby ball
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

product_meta.title: Omega Rugby Precision Training Rugby Ball
product_meta.description: The Omega Rugby training ball is constructed with a top quality rubber outer, including a long lasting dimpled finish, for superior grip and tackiness in all weather conditions. Hand stitched and balanced for superior flight and accuracy, an ideal ball for club, school and junior rugby. Rugby Ball is shipped deflated.
feature_bullets: Balanced weight for superior flight and accuracy

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
